title: [aerospace] High Employee Turnover Risk in Operations
description: The Operations department has the highest number of employees (14), but it also has a significant number of supervisors (11 under EMP002) indicating potential management issues. This could lead to high turnover rates if not addressed.
recommendations: Implement retention strategies for Operations staff
business_impact: High turnover can lead to operational disruptions and increased hiring costs.

title: [aerospace] Concentration Risk in Baggage Handling
description: All baggage handling records are from a single origin (ICN) and bag type (CHECKED), indicating a lack of diversity in operations which could lead to vulnerabilities if issues arise at this location.
recommendations: Diversify baggage handling operations across multiple origins
Assess risk management strategies for single-source operations
business_impact: Over-reliance on a single origin can lead to significant operational disruptions if issues occur.

title: [aerospace] High Maintenance Costs for Certain Aircraft Types

recommendations: Consider fleet optimization or replacement strategies
